B

botNextCommand() - Method in class GameLogic
Sets out what should be the bots next move pick up if it occupies a space with gold leave the game if it occupies an exit and has enough gold to win else call the method that decides the bot movement (random or tracking player)
botPlayer - Variable in class GameLogic
 
BotPlayer - Class in Unnamed Package
Handles the bots logic and movement in the game
BotPlayer() - Constructor for class BotPlayer

Accessor that returns player/bot coordinates (in the format {row number, column number})

Accessor that returns gold owned as an integer (this starts at 0 and increases as the player picks up gold)

P
